channel.title: Whangarei District Council Latest News
channel.description: The last 30 days of latest news published by Whangarei District Council

item.title: Fight the plastic – use mPark instead
item.description: This page contains information about the benefits of using mPark that will reduce the number of tickets issued.

item.title: Keep New Zealand beautiful
item.description: This page contains information about Clean Up Week 2018.

item.title: Fresh look for Botanica Fernery
item.description: This page contains information about a fresh new colour scheme for Botanica Gardens.

item.title: Alcohol bylaw review
item.description: This page contains information about the review of the Alcohol Bylaw.

item.title: Installation of heating appliances
item.description: This page contains information about building consents needed for installing solid fuel heaters.

item.title: Plastic free July
item.description: This page contains information about more news on going plastic-free this July.

item.title: Helicopter work on Parihaka tracks
item.description: This page contains information about the work on Parihaka's walking tracks.

item.title: New cemetery services on offer
item.description: This page contains information about our new cemetery services.

item.title: Easy Choice to feed Kiwi families for $60
item.description: This page contains information about the Easy Choice Family Kai initiative.

item.title: Gully trap inspections - Hikurangi
item.description: This page contains information about the inspection of gully traps in Hikurangi.

item.title: Hot diggity dog registration!
item.description: This page contains information about dog registrations.

item.title: New tsunami information boards for Whangārei coast
item.description: This page contains information about the new tsunami information boards for Whangarei coast.

item.title: Dali mural
item.description: This page contains information about the latest addition, Salvador Dali, to the tactical urbanism theme in Whangarei CBD.

item.title: Average 3.7 percent rates rise
item.description: This page contains information about the rates increase for Whangārei's average residential property is 3.7% for 2018/2019.

item.title: District weathers storm
item.description: This page contains information about the rainstorm our district had in the month of June 2018.

item.title: Waiting for dry weather
item.description: This page contains information about the progress on work at Whau Valley Dam.
